Workflow.WorkStageName:
The function of this screen is to **facilitate customer registration requests** from the CB team to the OP team.
① The **CB team submits the "Request for Registration of Customer" form** through the system.
② The **OP team reviews the request and processes the customer registration** accordingly.

The function of this screen is to **check for duplicate customer registrations** by verifying the existence of a **Customer Identification File (CIF) number** in the **Headquarters (HQ) database**.
① **Search the HQ database** for the provided CIF number.
② If a matching CIF number exists, **prevent duplicate registration**.
③ If no match is found, **proceed with new customer registration**.
This process ensures data integrity by avoiding redundant customer records.
**Search CIF No.** (Customer Information File Number)
Is this an **individual customer**?
Is the customer a **domestic resident**?

The function of this screen is to **retrieve and generate a BIC code for non-Korea resident customers**.
① **Search the HQ database** to check for existing BIC codes and prevent duplication.
② **Assign a new BIC code** if no matching record is found.
This process ensures that each non-Korea resident customer has a unique and valid BIC code in the system.
**BIC Code Inquiry and BIC Code Generation**

The function of this screen is to **register a new non-Korea resident customer**.
① **Enter the Customer ID** to initiate the registration process.
② The system verifies the ID and proceeds with customer registration.
This ensures accurate identification and proper record creation for non-Korea resident customers.
Preretrieve **head office customer information** for the entered **Customer ID**.
Is the company **domestically located**?

The function of this screen is to **input customer information from the "Request for Registration of Customer" form received from the CB team**.
① **Review the retrieved information** displayed on the screen.
② **Enter additional customer details** based on the form provided by the CB team.

The function of this screen is to **inquire about the KYC results and sanction screening outcomes** conducted at other branches.
① **Retrieve the KYC (Know Your Customer) verification results** performed for the selected customer at a different branch.
② **View the WLF (Watchlist Filtering) and Country Sanctions Filtering results** associated with the customer.

The function of this screen is to **input additional items** as required.
① **Enter the necessary information** into the designated fields.
② **Review the entered data** to ensure accuracy.
③ **Confirm and save** the input to update the system.
This screen allows users to add and manage supplementary details efficiently.

**(New Customer)** Generate **CIF No.** and register customer information.
**(Existing Customer)** Update customer information.

The function of this screen is to **verify a customer's transaction history and account status** to determine **KYC (Know Your Customer) eligibility**.
① **Check whether the customer has previous transactions** at the branch and review the account status.
② If the customer is **new**, verify whether a **new account is being opened** or if a **one-time transaction exceeds the threshold amount**.
③ If the customer meets the KYC criteria, display a **popup notification** indicating that **CDD (Customer Due Diligence) is required**.
Is this entity **subject to KYC (Know Your Customer) requirements**?
**New York Branch**?
**Customer Information Update**

The function of this screen is to **process customer information update requests from branches**.
① **Receive modification requests** when a branch identifies the need to update customer information.
② **Allow authorized users to edit and save changes** to ensure accurate and up-to-date customer records.
Is this a **customer management branch**?

The function of this screen is to **retrieve customer information for modification**.
① **Search for the target customer** whose information needs to be updated.
② **Display the relevant customer details** to verify and proceed with modifications.
Do you need to **review the change history of the customer information** for the entered **Customer ID**?

The function of this screen is to **modify retrieved customer information**.
① **Search for and retrieve customer information** from the system.
② **Make necessary modifications** to the customer's details.
③ **Save the updated information** to ensure the changes are applied.

The function of this screen is to **request information updates from the managing branch** (the branch responsible for customer information registration).
① **Select the target customer record** requiring modification.
② **Submit a request** to the managing branch for updates.
Is this a **head office modification**?

The function of this screen is to **retrieve and display the history of customer information changes**.
① **Search for customer records** based on specified criteria.
② **View a list of changes** made to customer information, including modified fields, timestamps, and responsible users.

The function of this screen is to **inquire about amendments made by the Head Office**.
① **Retrieve a history of changes** related to customer information or transactions made by the Head Office.
② **View detailed amendment records**, including the date, type of modification, and responsible user.
**New York Branch**?

The function of this screen is to **search for customer information based on specified conditions**.
① **Enter the required search criteria** to filter customer data.
② **Execute the inquiry** to retrieve a list of customers matching the conditions.
**Head Office Credit Rating Interface**
Change the **external credit rating registered by the branch**

The function of this screen is to **register a customer's credit rating**.
① **Enter the customer's credit rating details**, including the rating level and relevant information.
② **Save the registered credit rating** to update the system and associate it with the customer’s profile.

The function of this screen is to **delete a customer's credit rating** from the system.
① **Select the customer** whose credit rating needs to be removed.
② **Confirm the deletion** to remove the credit rating record.
**Regional Affiliate Code**?

The function of this screen is to **verify the existence of a customer group code** before performing any modifications.
① **Check whether the customer group code exists** in the system.
② If the code is found, proceed with **registration, modification, or deletion** as needed.
Does the **customer group code** exist?

The function of this screen is to **register and manage information about a corporate entity's affiliates**.
① **Enter affiliate details**, including name, business registration number, and relationship with the parent company.
② **Save the information** to store it in the system for reference and reporting.

The function of this screen is to **verify the application of changes made to customer group codes**.
① **Check whether registered, modified, or deleted entries** related to the customer group code are correctly applied.
② Ensure that all updates are accurately reflected in the system.
**Head Office Affiliate Code Interface**
**modify the customer group code/related information**?

The function of this screen is to **modify information related to a corporate customer's affiliates**.
① **Access and review the existing affiliate information** associated with the corporate customer.
② **Edit, update, or correct details** such as company name, ownership structure, or business relationships.
③ **Save the changes** to ensure the updated information is reflected in the system.
**delete the customer group code**?

The function of this screen is to **delete information related to a corporate entity's affiliates**.
① **Locate and select the affiliate information** that needs to be removed.
② **Confirm the deletion request** to ensure accurate record management.
